entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
